languages.text: {n}Черные цепи на теле Кибеллы выглядят как украшение, нежели инструмент пыток. Схватившись за их сплетение, девушка с силой дергает несколько раз, натягивая кожу до предела.{/n} "Все еще не рвется. Хорошо".

{n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."
languages.original_text: {n}Черные цепи на теле Кибеллы выглядят как украшение, нежели инструмент пыток. Схватившись за их сплетение, девушка с силой дергает несколько раз, натягивая кожу до предела.{/n} "Все еще не рвется. Хорошо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Attached to her body, the black chains resemble some grisly adornment rather than an implement of torture. Kibellah grabs the bundle of chains and tugs a few times, causing her skin to stretch taut.{/n} "Still no tearing. Good."

{n}Attached to her body, the black chains resemble some grisly adornment rather than an implement of torture. Kibellah grabs the bundle of chains and tugs a few times, causing her skin to stretch taut.{/n} "Still no tearing. Good."

{n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

{n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

{n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

languages.text: {n}Las negras cadenas cuelgan del cuerpo de Kibellah. Se asemejan más a adornos macabros que a herramientas de tortura. Kibellah agarra las cadenas y tira de ellas hasta que su piel se tensa.{/n} «No ha desgarrado la carne. Excelente».
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las negras cadenas cuelgan del cuerpo de Kibellah. Se asemejan más a adornos macabros que a herramientas de tortura. Kibellah agarra las cadenas y tira de ellas hasta que su piel se tensa.{/n} «No ha desgarrado la carne. Excelente».

languages.text: {n}黒い鎖がキベラの体からぶら下がっていた。拷問器具というよりは、不気味な装飾品のように見える。キベラは鎖を集め、皮膚がピンと張るまで引っ張った。{/n}「肉は引き裂かれていないわね。よし」
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}黒い鎖がキベラの体からぶら下がっていた。拷問器具というよりは、不気味な装飾品のように見える。キベラは鎖を集め、皮膚がピンと張るまで引っ張った。{/n}「肉は引き裂かれていないわね。よし」

languages.text: {n}黑色的锁环串在绮贝菈的身体上，看起来不像是刑具，更像是某种可怕的装饰品。绮贝菈将锁环整理好，用力拉扯着，直到皮肤绷紧为止。{/n}“肉体仍然没被撕裂，很好。”
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑色的锁环串在绮贝菈的身体上，看起来不像是刑具，更像是某种可怕的装饰品。绮贝菈将锁环整理好，用力拉扯着，直到皮肤绷紧为止。{/n}“肉体仍然没被撕裂，很好。”

languages.text: {n}Die schwarzen Ketten hängen von Kibellahs Körper herunter. Sie wirken eher wie makabrer Schmuck als wie Folterwerkzeuge. Kibellah ergreift die Ketten und zieht daran, bis ihre Haut straff gespannt ist.{/n} "Das Fleisch reißt nicht auf. Gut."
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die schwarzen Ketten hängen von Kibellahs Körper herunter. Sie wirken eher wie makabrer Schmuck als wie Folterwerkzeuge. Kibellah ergreift die Ketten und zieht daran, bis ihre Haut straff gespannt ist.{/n} "Das Fleisch reißt nicht auf. Gut."

languages.text: {n}Les chaînes noires qui pendent du corps de Kibellah ressemblent davantage à des atours macabres qu'à des instruments de torture. Elle les rassemble entre ses mains avant de tirer jusqu'à ce que sa peau se tende sur ses os.{/n} « La chair résiste encore et toujours. Bien. »
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les chaînes noires qui pendent du corps de Kibellah ressemblent davantage à des atours macabres qu'à des instruments de torture. Elle les rassemble entre ses mains avant de tirer jusqu'à ce que sa peau se tende sur ses os.{/n} « La chair résiste encore et toujours. Bien. »

languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."

languages.text: {n}Kara zincirler, Kibellah'nın vücudundan sarkıyor. İşkence aletinden ziyade dehşet verici bir takı gibi duruyorlar. Kibellah, zincirleri toplayıp cildi gerilene kadar çekiyor.{/n} "Bedenim hâlâ tek parça hâlinde. Güzel."
languages.original_text: {n}The black chains dangle from Kibellah's body. They look more like a macabre form of adornment than an implement of torture. Kibellah gathers up the chains and pulls them until her skin goes taut.{/n} "The flesh remains untorn. Good."
